name: World's End: Cat
description:
World's End: Cat is an insane one button action game on PC with chaos at its core.

Experience the power of lightning-infused axes as they explode evil cats during the catpocalypse.

Collect falling power ups to augment your normal throwing axes and fight to survive as Mang, the crazy monk.

Controls:

  • Spacebar

Made by Mathew Sherry
